thread.section_title: zChocolat Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of zChocolat | www.zchocolat.com
thread.title: Andrew O

author: Andrew O
title: Andrew O
text: From ordering, to been notified of delivery stage, and presentation of chocaltrs everything was perfect... combine that with my Wife's happiness and enjoyment from being able to decide which chocolate to eat from the accompanied booklet, and her telling me how incredible they taste... I am tremendously satisfied with ordering my Valentine's Day chocolates from zChocolat!
